projects.title: Team Hex
projects.desc: Team Hex is a sports team management platform. Team Hex features roster management, communication through email and live chat, and event scheduling.

projects.title: KecaFiles
projects.desc: A filehosting web app created with express with a mongo database.

projects.title: Cards against humanity
projects.desc: An online clone of the popular game Cards Against Humanity. This application implements Socket.io to communicate commands from the server to the React / Redux front-end.

projects.title: Impossible List
projects.desc: A tool to help create a list for tracking accoplishments.

projects.title: Spike
projects.desc: Spike is a game engine I'm working on for learning purposes.
